data.title: 422 Pearl Street, Burlington, Ontario, Canada
data.meta_description:
Specialties: At Blyth Academy Burlington, we offer individualized and flexible private education for high school and elementary students in Burlington’s historic Village Square. As a top institution among Ontario’s accredited private schools, we provide tailored educational experiences, making us a preferred choice for families seeking excellent private education. Our campus serves students from grades 5-12, delivering a rigorous academic program with full-time, part-time, term-by-term, and online options.
We stand out by blending high-quality education with exceptional sports training. Our Advanced Hockey Training and Prep Hockey programs, in collaboration with Conacher Hockey, offer aspiring players daily on-ice sessions and dryland training from expert coaches, integrating elite athletic training with comprehensive academics. Additionally, we partner with Empower Futbol, Edge Lacrosse, and Limitless Training Systems to offer flexible academic schedules combined with soccer, lacrosse, or custom fitness training for student-athletes.
Our affordable private education ensures each student meets their academic goals while excelling in personal growth. Blyth Academy Burlington is committed to nurturing every student's potential, thoroughly preparing them for university and beyond. Whether your focus is advanced academics or elite sports training, Blyth Academy Burlington offers a unique educational journey in a supportive community.

 Established in 1977.  Located in the heart of Village Square, Blyth Academy Burlington offers a comprehensive academic environment that nurtures curiosity, fosters creativity, and cultivates innovative thinking. Our hockey training program with the Wave is a favorite among students, and our flexible course structure suits busy student-athletes.
